articles.title: Greg Quicke: Australia's 'Space Gandalf' astronomer dies aged 62 - BBC.com
articles.description: Greg Quicke was one of Australia's most famous astronomers and appeared on the BBC's Stargazing Live.
articles.content:
By Simon Atkinson, BBC News, Brisbane
An Australian astronomer who appeared on the BBC's Stargazing Live alongside Professor Brian Cox, has died aged 62.
Greg Quicke from Broome, 2,000km (1,240 mil… [+2176 chars]
